title: Healing Word
content:
al to the D&D5e version. Every cleric needs to have this in their deck, the ability to cast healing from a long distance on an ally allows you to not risk your own position being capitalized by your enemies, because of this functionality, you can safely cast this to bring someone back in the fight when they go down. Unlike Cure Wounds, Healing Word is a bonus action which allows you to squeeze a cantrip, spell or a mace to the face.
